entry.title: After Years
entry.summary:
Author: Kelly_Shelly

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,445Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 42

Summary: It all started when Jason revived after 35, he woke up from the purest nothingness next to his tombstone."Uhm... what?" Jason slowly wakes up as he slowly gets up. He looks around as the memories of the Joker's torture hit him. Until he remembers, he died. Jason knows what to do, go to Batman, back to Bruce... Or not.

entry.title: I Think There's Been a Glitch
entry.summary:
Author: sk3tch3s_and_fanfics

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,061Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 0

Summary: 'I think you know the drill. Let's do this one last time. Hopefully.' Skyler Drake-Wayne has always known that her siblings were self-sacrificing idiots. Maybe she was one too. But that doesn't mean that Skyler felt like they deserved a such a caring family after everything from her childhood. Of course, Tim does. He was the equivelent of a parent to them, what with all of the neglect and abuse imposed by their... questionable parents. But Skyler? She's been nothing more than a stupid anomaly who gets their hopes too high. But, hey. At least vigilanteism is a fun and productive way to stick it to the man, right?

entry.title: Violet Birds in Emerald Skies
entry.summary:
Author: Niveara

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,206Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 729

Summary: Hal.exe stopped working. This child, this Sparrow, was THE Sparrow? Like the Champion of Predator, Wielder of Violet Light, Paragon of Love, Sparrow? The Star Sapphire with ‘rings for eyes’ that Kilowog, Green Lantern 1-9-8-6, was always going on and on about? The individual Carol, Star Sapphire 1-9-6-2, was always saying was a 'stain’ against the Zamaron’s Star Sapphires Corps?But they were just an itty bitty little baby.“You’re joking right” he teased assuming this was just Sinestro trying his hand at humor “please tell me your joking. Surely a 6 year old human child isn’t THE Sparrow”“You are correct” Sinestro agreed flatly a small smile forming upon his face as Hal relaxed at his response “a 6 year old human child is not THE Sparrow”“Oh thank-“ Hal started only to get cut off as Sinestro finished his thoughts.“It is my understanding that the child is only 4 and a half”ORTim Drake becomes a Star Sapphire shortly after watching the Flying Graysons fall. This has consequences.

Author: MidnightSnow_22

entry.title: Company
entry.summary:
Author: PrinceOfAltoids
